basics.name: Kelly Lee
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science with a focus in Cyber Security in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2018.

courses: ICS 111: Intro to Computer Science I
ICS 141: Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science I
ICS 211: Intro to Computer Science II
ICS 222: Basic Concepts of Computer Science
ICS 241: Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science II
ICS 355: Security and Trust I: Resource Protections
ICS 455: Security and Trust II: Information Assurance
